name: Movies That Have Sequels Quiz | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: '2001' was followed by a delayed sequel many years later. Who starred in the sequel?
questions.explanation:
Roy Scheider.

	Hackman did 'French Connection' (and the sequel); Ford did the 'Indiana Jones' movies.

questions.text: 'Paleface' was followed by 'Son of Paleface'. Bob Hope starred in both; who was his leading lady (in both)?
questions.explanation:
Jane Russell.

	One of the first sequels?

questions.text: 'Superman' was followed by many sequels. Who played Perry White in the original?
questions.explanation:
Jackie Cooper.

	I and II were good, after that ...

questions.text: 'King Kong' also had a sequel. What was it called?
The Thin Man' had many sequels - all with the same stars. Who was the male lead?
'The Hustler' was also followed by a delayed sequel. Who played Paul Newman's girl friend in the original?
questions.explanation:
Piper Laurie.

	Fine movie with a weaker sequel.

questions.text: 'Father of the Bride' also had a sequel. Elizabeth Taylor was the bride. Who was the father?
questions.explanation:
Spencer Tracy.

	Not all of his comedies were with Katharine Hepburn.

questions.text: 'Gentlemen Prefer Blondes' was followed by a sequel. Who played the 'blonde' in the original?
questions.explanation:
Marilyn Monroe.

	With Jane Russell (as the brunette).

questions.text: 'Rooster Cogburn' was a sequel; who was the star of the original?
'A Man Called Horse' was followed by a sequel. Who starred in the original?
questions.explanation:
Richard Harris.

	Grimes did 'Summer of 42' (and the sequel). Nicholson did 'Chinatown' (and the sequel).
